content: 11sc insert hook through both edge stitches photos 4-7 3dc 3tr 2dc single_crochet 40 + 2sl photos 8-9 cut the yarn and leave a long thread @olyasamoseienko - crochet narwhal pattern 4 hide thread in the method shown on the photos 10-16 10 11 12 16 13 14 15 your narwhal s body is ready it should look like shown on the photos 17-18 17 18 @olyasamoseienko - crochet narwhal pattern 5 fins 2 details crochet with main yarn in the continuous spiral don t stuff 1 6sc in the ra 6 2 6sc 6 3 single_crochet increase *3 9 19 20 4 9sc 9 5 2sc increase *3 12 6 3sc increase *3 15 photo 19 video about how to crochet next 7-8 rounds https //youtu be/7g5alkuuvoc click on the link to go there or copy and paste in the https input line 7 fold in half make 7sc insert hook through both edge stitches chain 7 photos 21-22 8 turn and crochet flo 7sc photos 22-24 turn detail and crochet single_crochet in the side loop photo 25 on the 21 22 other side of the chain 7sc 15 photo 26 9 4sc increase *3 18 10 18sc 18 11 increase 8sc *2 20 12-13 20sc 20 photo 27 14 fold in half make 10sc insert hook through both edge stitches 10 photos 28-30 cut the yarn and leave a long thread for sewing sew fins to the body on the 17 and 27th rounds distance between fins 30sc photos 31-33 24 24 25 26 30 27 28 29 31 32 33 @olyasamoseienko - crochet narwhal pattern 6 horn crochet with contrast yarn in the continuous spiral stuff as you go 1 4sc in the ra 34 35 2 4sc 4 3 single_crochet increase *2 6 4 6sc 6 5 2sc increase *2 8 6 8sc 8 7 3sc increase *2 10 8 10sc 10 9 4sc increase *2 12 10 12sc 12 + 2sl cut the yarn and leave a long thread for 36 sewing sew horn on the 7-10th rounds on the forehead photos 34-36 @olyasamoseienko - crochet narwhal pattern 7 embroider eyes on the sides on the 11-16 rounds as shown on the photos 37-46 watch the video about how to embroider eyes by this method https //youtu be/csb0h1rnhum copy link and paste in the https input line 37 38 39 40 43 41 42 44 45 46 congratulations your narwal is ready share your narwhal on social media and tag me instagram @_olyasam_ @olya_samoseienko facebook @olyasamtoys youtube @olyasamtoysandpatterns pinterest @olya__samoseienko etsy @olyasamtoys @olyasamoseienko -
